my_business: Aakavi Coir Mill is dedicated to manufacturing and exporting high-quality coir fibre, coco peat blocks (5kg and 650g), and coco chips. Our eco-friendly products are widely used in agriculture, horticulture, hydroponics, and soil conditioning — promoting sustainable and organic growth across the globe.
top_product: Coco Peat 5kg Blocks – Our best-selling product, made from 100% natural coconut husk. These blocks expand when hydrated and are widely used in agriculture, horticulture, and hydroponics as an eco-friendly growing medium that retains moisture, improves aeration, and enhances root growth.
ideal_referral: Exporters, distributors, and businesses in agriculture, horticulture, hydroponics, and landscaping who seek reliable suppliers of high-quality coco peat blocks, coir fibre, and coco chips.Farmers, nursery owners, greenhouse operators, and agro traders looking for sustainable and organic growing media solutions.
top_problem_solved: Farmers and greenhouse growers often struggled with soil that dried too quickly, reducing crop yield and increasing water usage. Through Aakavi Coir’s premium coco peat blocks, we provided a sustainable solution — a natural growing medium that retains moisture, improves aeration, and supports healthy root growth. This not only boosted productivity but also helped our clients save up to 40% of their irrigation water.
